name: KMESmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on Lights”
”Alexa, turn off Light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Experience seamless control of your smart home with our cutting-edge IoT device. Connect effortlessly to Alexa and transform your living space with simple voice commands. Say 'Alexa, turn on the lights' to illuminate your home, or 'Alexa, set the thermostat to 72 degrees' for the perfect comfort. Elevate your smart living experience with our innovative technology.
